greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The least number with the prime signature of the odd part of n: a(n) = A046523(A000265(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ From A046523
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 11 2020
